description: Repository class for baby name data operations, handling database queries for fetching, searching, and filtering baby names based on various criteria.

classes.name: BabyNameRepository
classes.description: Repository class for baby name data operations, providing methods to query and filter baby names from the database.

methods.name: getAllNames
methods.description: Retrieve all baby names from the database.

methods.name: searchNames
methods.description: Search for baby names based on various optional filters such as query string, gender, language, rashi, and starting character.

methods.name: getNamesByGender
methods.description: Retrieve baby names filtered by gender.

methods.name: getNamesByLanguage
methods.description: Retrieve baby names filtered by language.

methods.name: getNamesByRashi
methods.description: Retrieve baby names filtered by rashi.

methods.name: getNameById
methods.description: Retrieve a baby name by its unique ID.

methods.name: getStartingCharacters
methods.description: Retrieve a list of distinct starting characters for baby names in a specified language.
